CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Share Content stage positioned above or below the Join Group or Community stage?
SRP.A: The Share Content stage is positioned {above} the Join Group or Community stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Content?
VE.A: The value of stage View Content is {225}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Like or Comment?
VE.A: The value of stage Like or Comment is {144}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {97}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Content, with a value of {225}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Participate in Paid Subscription, with a value of {20}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload?
SC.A: Decreased by {15} Million Users from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment?
SC.A: Decreased by {81} Million Users from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Content Creation or Upload to stage Participate in Paid Subscription?
SC.A: Decreased by {3} Million Users from stage Content Creation or Upload to stage Participate in Paid Subscription.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 184? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 21? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Participate in Paid Subscription} stage has {20}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 51 and 80? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage View Content to Like or Comment, or from stage Like or Comment to Share Content?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Content} to {Like or Comment} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Like or Comment to Share Content, or from stage Content Creation or Upload to Participate in Paid Subscription?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to {Share Content} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, from stage Like or Comment to Share Content, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to stage {Share Content} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Content Creation or Upload to Participate in Paid Subscription, from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage View Content to Like or Comment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Content} to stage {Like or Comment} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Content} and {Like or Comment} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Content Creation or Upload} and {Participate in Paid Subscription} stages.
